snippet.title: 10 MORE Powerful Legendaries That Are EASY To Get In Borderlands 4
snippet.description:
Vault Hunters, MORE legendary loot is here! In this Borderlands 4 guide we cover 10 early game legendary weapons, grenades, and gear you need to farm right now. From Birt's Bees and Darkbeast to Jelly, Chuck, Chaumurky, and more, these are the best Borderlands 4 legendary drops to supercharge your build.

0:00 Intro
0:21 All 10 Legendaries
0:54 Lucky Clover
2:48 Swarm
4:31 Budget Deity 
6:23 Complex Root
8:18 Chuck
10:22 Chaumurky
11:54 Darkbeast
13:44 Lead Balloon
15:31 Jelly
16:45 Birt's Bees
19:16 Subscribe For More Borderlands 4
